Robust funding of this Center is essential to ensure the safety of our skies.

The research, testing and prototype development conducted by Tech Center staff helps shape the future of our nation’s air transportation system. In short, it is the nation’s premier air transportation system federal laboratory.
The Tech Center is the Federal Aviation Administration’s national scientific test base for the research, development, test, and evaluation of air transportation systems.

I have introduced HR 11149, the bipartisan Atlantic Coastal Economies Protection Act, which would prohibit seismic airgun blasting in the Atlantic, to protect marine life and our coastal economy. #ACEPA. #NoSeimic #ProtectOurCoast #BlocktheBlast
Seismic airgun blasting can also lead to declines in catch rates by as much as 80 percent for some fish species. #ACEPA. #NoSeimic #ProtectOurCoast #BlocktheBlast

Seismic airgun blasting for oil and gas can disturb, injure, or kill marine life, including the endangered North Atlantic Right Whale, one of God’s most majestic creatures. #ACEPA. #NoSeimic #ProtectOurCoast #BlocktheBlast
